cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 2nd Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 2nd Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Ideal for Families spacious Villas  with Super King bed and 2 single beds. Lounge - double divan. Sleeps max 6. Architecturally designed villas, open plan living/dining area.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 2 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: For business travellers or solo adventurers, our charming studios offer the perfect blend of comfort and convenience. Sink into a plush King-size bed, enjoy an ensuite bathroom with a refreshing shower, and make yourself at home

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
